sql.query: SELECT theater.tno, theater.name, theater.mno, theater.ano, theaterinfo.tino, TO_CHAR(theaterinfo.time, 'HH24:MI'), theaterinfo.seatlimit, movie.name, movie.age, movie.fileurl, movie.price, area.name FROM theater INNER JOIN theaterinfo ON theater.tno = theaterinfo.tno AND theaterinfo.tino = :tino INNER JOIN movie ON theater.mno = movie.mno INNER JOIN area ON theater.ano = area.ano

mapping.getProperty: theater.tno, theater.name, theater.mno, theater.ano, theaterinfo.tino, theaterinfo.time, theaterinfo.seatlimit, movie.name, movie.age, movie.fileurl, movie.price, area.name

sql.query: SELECT distinct seat.randomkey, id, tino, cdate FROM seat INNER JOIN payment ON seat.randomkey = payment.randomkey WHERE id LIKE '${id}' ORDER BY cdate DESC

SELECT count(randomkey) as ticketcount, randomkey, adult, senior, disabled, teenager, charge, cdate FROM payment WHERE RANDOMKEY LIKE '${randomkey}' GROUP BY randomkey, adult, senior, disabled, teenager, charge, cdate

mapping.getProperty: ticketcount, randomkey, adult, senior, disabled, teenager, charge, cdate
